/home/a100/cu111/bin/nvcc  -g  -Xcompiler=-fPIC -Wno-deprecated-gpu-targets -shared -dlink CMakeFiles/test_nccl_thread.dir/test_nccl_thread.cc.o -o CMakeFiles/test_nccl_thread.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/home/a100/cu111/targets/x86_64-linux/lib/stubs  -L/home/a100/cu111/targets/x86_64-linux/lib ../libcudahelp.a
